name: Model Meka: "Age of Progress"
description: A metal mechanism model with a complex structure. Said to be a reproduction of the device installed in front of the Court Region Waterway Hub, which is in turn regarded as one of the most famous works showcasing clockwork meka design aesthetics.\nThough the device itself does not represent a breakthrough beyond the basic principles set down by Lord-Artificer Alain Guillotin, but the people still regard it as a symbol of the continuous advances in "mechanical beauty" over the centuries. Or perhaps it is as the critics say: An eternally turning device is like the ceaselessly turning wheels of time...
